name: Modules.Cloud.Emails
summary: Provides methods for accessing ArrowDB Email service.

methods.name: send
methods.summary: Send an email to a list of email adresses.
methods.description:
See Emails: Send Emails for the request parameters supported by this method.

If you haven't configured your SMTP setting yet, go to your App Settings and configure and test your SMTP setting. You also need to create at least one email template.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.summary: Callback function to execute when the method completes.
